start_project.description_form: Contact us to learn more about our solutions. And don't forget, everything can be customized to your business needs.
pages.home.section_six_how_we_can_help.d: As an app development company, we build native mobile apps for iOS and Android, web applications, apps for wearables and B2B/enterprise software.

With a hands-on approach to design thinking, we identify UX tactics to validate and test design solutions that anticipate a user need or challenge and convert wireframes and prototypes to web and mobile end-products. UI/UX design is a defining factor for any digital product these days, focused on improving conversion and increasing customer engagement.

Our multidisciplinary development team allows you to scale and upgrade your team, product, quality and velocity. We will expand your staff with full/part-time developers ready to start your projects right away.
Our full‑stack design and development agency based around Florianópolis provides front‑end and back‑end development services working closely with our designers.

pages.home.head_title: Web & Mobile Application Development | Plathanus Tech
pages.home.head_description: Plathanus Tech is a multidisciplinary team motivated to create truly amazing software. We help companies in the US, Brazil and other countries to carry out projects and create innovative digital products in IOS, Android and Web, with the application of Design Thinking, Lean Startup and Agile Methods techniques. Our team can be the extension of your team for the dedicated and continuous development of your product.
